reviewText: Bill Dance should have been a comedian.  Why he bothers with fishing, I don't know.  The situations he gets himself into couldn't be scripted- no one would believe them.  My vote for funniest man ever.
Tape got stuck in the vcr first time I played it.  Dont know if it was the tape or the vcr's fault.
1/2 of what is on Vol. 2 is what was on Vol. 1. Filled with advertisements and rambling talking by his producer. Disappointed. There was less advertisments on the tv show than on the tapes.
